about_the_game: The Creation Kit is a free downloadable editor that allows you to make Creations for Starfield and then share them with other players across Bethesda.net. It's the same tool that we use to create the game and we're putting the power to create new content in your hands - new quests, environments, characters, dialogue, weapons, and more.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence
Blood
Suggestive Themes
Strong Language 
Use of Drugs

detailed_description: The Creation Kit is a free downloadable editor that allows you to make Creations for Starfield and then share them with other players across Bethesda.net. It's the same tool that we use to create the game and we're putting the power to create new content in your hands - new quests, environments, characters, dialogue, weapons, and more.

name: Starfield: Creation Kit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (10.0.19043)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700, NVIDIA GeForce 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with updates
  • Processor: Anything with decent CPU clock and 8+ cores
  • Memory: 48 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: The Creation Kit is a free downloadable editor that allows you to make Creations for Starfield and then share them with other players across Bethesda.net.
